DOC.brief_summary: The investigator want test navigation system guidance insertion stent graft abdominal aortic aneurysm . The navigation system consist software develop SINTEF Health , custom make catheter micro position sensor tip emitter induces electromagnetic field around patient . Preoperative CT- intraoperative DynaCT- data reconstruct 3 dimensional image . The 3 dimensional image load navigation system . Then magnetic field , patient find , calibrate 3 dimensional image . When catheter insert iliac artery aorta , position sensor ( tip catheter ) display real time exact anatomic location 3 dimensional image . Null hypothesis ( H0 ) : - Insertion stent graft perform equally satisfactorily fluoroscopy alone fluoroscopy new navigation technology Alternative hypothesis ( H2 ) : - Insertion stent graft NOT perform equally satisfactorily fluoroscopy alone fluoroscopy new navigation technology
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Fluoroscopy Technological Methods Guidance During Endovascular Procedures
DOC.criteria: AAA diameter > 5,0 cm suitable endovascular technique Normal creatinine > 60 year age Known heart failure unstable coronary disease Other morbidity normally contraindicate endovascular treatment
